name: RNR_TXT001 - IT'S THE WEEKEND!
description:
My genesis piece, and a celebration of that time of the week when art gets created. 

Analog video feedback loop using an RCA T09085 television and a Samsung SCL810 camcorder with built-in digital mirror effect and text. Minor digital color correction. 

Music created improvisationally with KORG Minilogue and ZOOM G1-on direct to cassette tape.
